# Sequence Through Multiple Metrics

```{r}
seq.df <- nest.df %>% 
  bind_cols(
    taxa_seq(.data = .,
             .key_col = unique_id,
             .counts_col = reporting_value,
             .filter_cols_vec = c("class", "order", "family"),
             .group_col = genus,
             .job = "rich"))
```


```{r, echo=FALSE}
standard_dt(seq.df)
```


```{r}
nest.df <- nest.df %>% 
  bind_cols(
    taxa_seq(.data = .,
             .key_col = unique_id,
             .counts_col = reporting_value,
             .filter_cols_vec = c("class", "order", "family"),
             .group_col = genus,
             .job = "rich"),
    taxa_seq(.data = .,
             .key_col = unique_id,
             .counts_col = reporting_value,
             .filter_cols_vec = c("class", "order", "family"),
             .group_col = genus,
             .job = "pct"),
    taxa_seq(.data = .,
             .key_col = unique_id,
             .counts_col = reporting_value,
             .filter_cols_vec = c("class", "order", "family"),
             .group_col = genus,
             .base_log = 2,
             .job = "shannon"))
```


```{r, echo=FALSE}
standard_dt(nest.df)
```
